item.title: About me
item.description: In this blog space I like to post about game dev, foods, and occasional random thoughts. I keep this mainly as my own recipe storage; for both games I develop and also great foods I find all over. Enjoy your stay!

item.title: French Toast
item.description: Ingredients: Fresh or lightly stale bread 1 tablespoon powdered sugar Maple syrup Berries (whichever you prefer; strawberries, raspberries, blueberries) 2 eggs 1dl milk 1 teaspoon cinnamon Method: Beat the 2 eggs with 1dl of milk in a bowl. Add the cinnamon to the mixture and stir until properly incorporated. Heat up a pan with some butter on medium heat. Dip the bread in to the mixture both sides and put on the heated pan.

item.title: Project: Frog Can Jump
item.description: FrogCanJump is a 2D doodle jump inspired platformer arcade game. It’s not yet finished and is currently still in development. I’m continuing work on the game as I still see a lot of potential features and juice that can be added. So far the very basics are implemented that makes this in to a game. The player can jump and score is kept, best highscore is stored to add an extra challenge of beating ones own score.

item.title: Project: Pajatso
item.description: This project is a 2D game created with the Godot game engine. The game is a remake of the old classic pajatso gambling game. The player’s goal is to shoot coins in to boxes to score. You can adjust the strength of the shot by following the bar progress. You’re able to get more coins by when the timer is done counting down. Once the timer is done press the get more coins button.

item.title: Simple Meatballs
item.description: Simple meatballs that can be prepared in a short amount of time

item.title: Potato Salad
item.description: An oil based potato salad that is perfect for summer days
